item.title: [PI] ::combat Command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:547913”]The variable extraCb does not exist. Like I said way back when The Web Guy gave you the command. He did not give you a working command. There are things you have to change. Hence the 1 error. Read the error, and if you don’t understand it, google it.

Hint: Your combat level variable is NOT extraCb[/quote]

I think I understand what you mean now. The compiler doesn’t understand the “extraCb” variable because it hasn’t been defined. Perhaps the variable is named something different?

Edit: I fixed that error by finding the correct variable, but now when I compile, it comes up with a new error:

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:56: error: bad operand types for binary operator '+' c.newCmb += combat; ^ first type: boolean second type: int Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

This is my new ::combat command:

if(playerCommand.startsWith("combat") && c.playerRights >= 2){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(playerCommand.substring(7)); c.newCmb += combat; c.updateRequired = true; c.setAppearanceUpdateRequired(true); }

Please read this new thread for the updated version of the error. :palm:

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ::combat Command [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The variable extraCb does not exist. Like I said way back when The Web Guy gave you the command. He did not give you a working command. There are things you have to change. Hence the 1 error. Read the error, and if you don’t understand it, google it.

Hint: Your combat level variable is NOT extraCb
